summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5849 for the improvement of 13th Avenue South, from Charlestown Street to Spokane Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 77109, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
